name: RGB (alialani)
description:
RGB

In this puzzle game, place mirrors to guide the RGB lights to their destinations.

Controls:
Left Click: Place/Remove Mirror

Right Click: Rotate Mirror

Q/E: Rotate Camera

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

<10 mins approx. play time.

This game was created for Mini Jam 111 in which the theme was Colors. 

Credits:

All sfx and assets are made by me.

"Concentration" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
